title: Sweet Potato Soup
directions: In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat. Add onion and sweet potato and sauté 5 minutes. Add couscous and sauté 5 minutes to toast. Add 2 tablespoons water to pot, cover and cook 3 minutes.

Remove lid and add vegetable broth and taco seasoning. Reduce heat and simmer until sweet potatoes are fork-tender, 25-30 minutes. Add kale and simmer 5 minutes more until wilted. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Ladle soup into large bowls and serve with crusty bread for dipping.
ingredients: 2 medium Sweet Potatoes, peeled and cubed
½ bag TJ's Organic Tuscan Kale
6 cups TJ's Low Sodium Vegetable Broth
